articles.title: Philippines logs 5,411 new COVID-19 cases, 1,507,755 in total - Devdiscourse
articles.description: The Philippines' Department of Health (DOH) reported on Sunday 5,411 new COVID-19 infections, bringing the total number of confirmed cases in the Southeast Asian country to 1,507,755.

articles.title: The Pandemic Has a New Epicenter: Indonesia - The New York Times
articles.description: The suffering that ravaged places like India and Brazil — with deaths soaring, hospitals overwhelmed and oxygen running out — has reached Southeast Asia.
articles.content:
Indonesias health minister, Budi Gunadi Sadikin, said Friday that the country had increased testing to about 230,000 people a day, from about 30,000 in December. His target is 400,000 a day.
